channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report E-2023080773
item.description:
Report E-2023080773

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-05T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RANGER LANDSTAR INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On August 21, 2023 at 2141 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contracted by Landstar personnel in Meridian, Mississippi regarding the release of approximately (20) gallons of AFCO 4363 Persafe 23 UN3109, 5.2, II) from (1) 330-gallon IBC plastic tote. Contractors were dispatched to the site to perform all onsite clean-up activities. Upon arrival, contractors confirmed that the release was contained to an area on the trailer and a 1’x20’ area on surrounding concrete The release was cleaned up with absorbents and the proper PPE. All waste generated from addressing this release was containerized in (2) 55-gallon DF, which was then taken offsite by the contractor for proper disposal.

item.title: Report X-2023080632
item.description:
Report X-2023080632

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered on Unload Door 51 already damaged. DescribePack: One of the cans were bent around cap area, causing cap to loosen and internal leakage to occur. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The leak was contained to the package.

item.title: Report X-2023080610
item.description:
Report X-2023080610

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND INSIDE OF A NON-HAZARDOUS TOTE. THE PACKAGE HAD A STRONG ACID SMELL COMING FROM INSIDE. DescribePack: THE CORROSIVE TORN THE CARDBOARD BOX INTO PIECES. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLE USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS NEEDED.
